creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: image of a hammerhead shark lying on piece of land; body of water in washy red pigment on L, with mountains in the background; red sky that gradates to blue at horizon line, with black diagonal scribbles throughout; red building on the R, with two palm trees at entrance; boat in CR; anchor in ULC
markings: LRC, verso: gallery label from George Adams Gallery
signed: LRC, in black ink: H.C.W. 74 | LRC, in black ink: H.C. Westerman
title: Untitled (Hammerhead Shark)
